extension.description: Jamie[B]5[/B][COLOR limegreen]Kodi[/COLOR] Wizard offers many maintenance features, selective add-on data saving, and automated build installs.
extension.news: 1.2.9 - Fix NuMb3r5 cache clearing - Fix hang during repo force check - Fix logins being restored every startup - Fix some file permission errors - Fix OS X backup errors 1.2.8 - Add Gaia PM OAuth - Fix binary add-on restoration - Fix some issues with old settings - Fix timing on many startup tasks 1.2.7 - Add TheMovieDb Helper 1.2.6 - Fix Seren PM OAuth 1.2.5 - Fix typo in debridit.py 1.2.4 - Cover more edge cases during binary detection 1.2.3 - Fix notification ID bug 1.2.2 - Add Seren PM OAuth - Add AllDebrid spport for Gaia, Seren, ResolveURL, and URLResolver 1.2.1 - General bug fixes 1.2.0 - Silence save data notifications on startup - Fix Addon Installer menu - Convert addons.txt to JSON format 1.1.1 - Fix error on advancedsettings categories 1.1.0 - Add back advancedsettings area under System Tweaks/Fixes - Rudimentary version of advancedsettings editor. Can currently only handle editing pre-existing tags under 'cache' and 'network'. - Convert advanced.txt to JSON format - Add "built-in" advancedsettings.xml presets 1.0.3 - Update artwork - Fix rare issues with URLs not working - Fix repetitive build prompt (again) - Fix builds downloading twice - Fix title coloring on notifications - Fix auto repo install - Fix first run settings not being respected 1.0.2 - Fix crash in login menu - Fix auto install repo 1.0.1 - Fix double startup - Fix repetitive build prompt - Fix main menu not opening on Krypton - Fix notification timeout - Fix crash in Trakt menu 1.0.0 - Initial Commit

extension.disclaimer: Möglicherweise sind einge Teile dieses Addons in Ihrem Land illegal, Sie sollten dies unbedingt vor der Installation überprüfen.
Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws before installing.
extension.description: Bekijk Netflix films en tvprogramma's in Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: Sommige delen van deze add-on zijn mogelijk onwettig in jouw land - raadpleeg de lokale wetgeving alvorens deze add-on te installeren.
extension.description: Netflix VOD サービスアドオン
extension.disclaimer: 一部の国では、このアドオンが不法でありますので、設置する前に必ず関連法律を確認してください
일부 국가에서는 이 애드온의 일부가 불법일 수도 있으니, 설치하기전 관련 법을 확인하기 바랍니다.
Alcune parti di questo addon potrebbero non essere legali nel proprio paese di residenza - si prega di verificare le leggi locali prima dell'installazione.
Előfordulhat, hogy a kiegészítő néhány része nem törvényes az Ön országában - telepítés előtt tájékozódjon a helyi törvényekről.
extension.language: en cs de es hr hu it ja ko nl pl pt sv
extension.news:
v0.16.3 (2020-01-18) -Fixed an issue that causing addon freeze on export/update to library -Fixed an regression issue that causing http error 401 -Fixed an issue that causing unicodedecode error at startup -Fixed an issue that in some cases prevented the export of a tv show season -Generally optimized addon speed -Many improvements to the code
v0.16.2 (2020-01-07) -Improved add-on startup -Improved loading of profiles list -Added in expert setting a choice to speed up service or addon startup -Fixed an issue that causing addon misbehaviour using multiple Kodi profiles -Fixed an issue that causing addon breakage with sqlite connections -Fixed some python 3 issues on Android -Handled cases of metadata not available -Permanently removed sharing Kodi videos settings between profiles -Updated de, es, it translations -Minor improvements

extension.summary: TheMovieDb Helper - Now With Trakt Support!
extension.description: TheMovieDb Helper provides details about movies, tvshows and actors from TMDb. Users can access a variety of lists from TMDb and Trakt.
extension.news: 2.2.39 - Add role to label2[CR]2.2.38 - Expand Trakt list limit option[CR]2.2.37 - Add throwaway var to attempt fix for _strptime import bug[CR]2.2.36 - Possible fix for old settings format log spam[CR]2.2.35 - Potential fix for datetime bug in py2[CR]2.2.34 - Fix for plugin failed to play error[CR]2.2.33 - Fix for context menu trakt management of tvshows[CR]2.2.32 - Fix for trakt collection url not resolving to details[CR]2.2.31 - Add option to disable folder creation check[CR]2.2.30 - Reattempt create filepath as possible fix for false failure report[CR]2.2.29 - Only skip TMDbHelper .strm files in local library[CR]2.2.28 - Add options for add to library path[CR]2.2.26/27 - Fixes for add to library[CR]2.2.25 - Formatting future episodes fix[CR]2.2.24 - Browse Trakt Collection[CR]2.2.23 - Add to Kodi Library function[CR]2.2.22 - Player now ignores strm files in local library[CR]2.2.21 - Improvements to In-Progress[CR]2.2.20 - Add option to hide unaired episodes/movies. Format unaired episode/movie labels to red italic[CR]2.2.19 - Additional artwork types from kodilibrary[CR]2.2.18 - Cleanup and clear some empty keys[CR]2.2.17 - Add person kodidb stats to service monitor[CR]2.2.16 - Fix service monitor for people[CR]2.2.14/5 - playmedia param for close dialog[CR]2.2.13 - Extra checks to prevent double adding[CR]2.2.11 - Add Rule improvements to Discover[CR]2.2.10 - Move stats to infoproperties[CR]2.2.9 - DB Stats for Person[CR]2.2.8 - Use select dialog instead of container for discover method[CR]2.2.7 - Add discover select boxes[CR]2.2.6 - Fix for unicode error in add_query params[CR]2.2.5 - Expose discover method for users[CR]2.2.4 - Cleanup for window manager service monitor[CR]2.2.3 - Add close dialog option[CR]2.2.2 - Add Gender Field[CR]2.2.1 - Additional Sets Properties[CR]2.2.0 - Call Auto method for handling extendedinfo experience

extension.description: Jamie's repo containing VOD build with Netflix looking skin
